item.title: 317 equip.dat (equip slot file)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:6, topic:543598”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=662478.msg4428059#msg4428059 date=1401790357]
This isn’t a binary file, so why call it dat? I would just store all of this in SQL anyways…
[/quote]
it is a binary file. the pastebin is only the output from my program.
the file is a byte array of “totalItems” length[/quote]Thanks for clearing that up, I would still use SQL though. The interface would make it much easier to use and query times are near to nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 equip.dat (equip slot file)
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

lare69:

isn’t this supposed to be dumped from the cache and done through item definitions…?

this is but there is no value in the cache that says “hey im a hat”.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:543598”]I like how the file starts ItemName: SlotNumber
then has ItemName: is ItemType
and bits of the first one.

Anyway, this is pretty neat but do you know if the higher revisions (I have a supposed 600+ version of a equipment.dat) of this were done the same?[/quote]
i don’t have any knowledge of newer revisions. The reason for that is the values with the slot number after them are ones that aren’t determined by the parse alone, i had to give it a value. I gave it a few predefined things to speed it along.

else { System.out.print(i + ":" + it.name + " " + it.actions[1] + ": "); t = s.nextByte();//s is my scanner for reading in if (t < 0) {//if i made a typo i can go back i += t; continue; }

item.title: 317 equip.dat (equip slot file)
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Here is my parse: feel free to check if anything is wrong. http://pastebin.com/10bMi1iX
Where there are typos, check below it a little. i did fix a few screwups already:
item Pre>fixed
3793: 7>4
4611: 3>0
6400: 4>0

If you find any typos feel free to post for me. ill update the .dat
Those are the ones i know of (changed those in hex, not in the dump text)
code for the parse - major ugly lol

[code] byte t = -1;
if (it.actions != null) {

            if ("Wear".equalsIgnoreCase(it.actions[1]) || "Wield".equalsIgnoreCase(it.actions[1])) {
                if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("dagger") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains(" bow ") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("javelin") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("flowers") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("spear") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("knife") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("crossbow") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("longbow") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("machete") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("shortbow") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("staff") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("axe") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("wand") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("halberd") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("scimitar") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("sword") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("dart") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("mace") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("warhammer") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("maul")) {
                    t = 3;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is weapon");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("shield") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("book")) {
                    t = 5;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is shield");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("boots")) {
                    t = 10;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is boots");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("cape") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("cloak")) {
                    t = 1;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is cape");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("gloves") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("gauntlet") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("vamb")) {
                    t = 9;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is gloves");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("amulet") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("necklace") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("pendant") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("symbol")) {
                    t = 2;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is amulet");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("robe top") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("apron")|| it.name.toLowerCase().contains(" body") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("shirt") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("platebody") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("chainbody")) {
                    t = 4;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is top");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("helm") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("eye patch") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("headband") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("mask") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("beret") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("cavalier") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("partyhat") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("tiara") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("snelm") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains(" hat") || it.name.equals("Hat")) {
                    t = 0;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is hat");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("platelegs") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("chaps") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("plateskirt") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("pants") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("trousers") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("robe bottom") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("skirt")) {
                    t = 7;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is legs");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("ring")) {
                    t = 12;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is ring");
                } else if (it.name.toLowerCase().contains("arrow") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("brutal") || it.name.toLowerCase().contains("bolt")) {
                    t = 13;
                    System.out.println(i + ":" + it.name + " is arrow");
                } else {
                    System.out.print(i + ":" + it.name + " " + it.actions[1] + ": ");
                    t = s.nextByte();
                    if (t < 0) {//if i made a typo i can go back
                        i += t;
                        continue;
                    }
                }
            }

        }
        val[i] = t;[/code]

The file is saved in byte form. -1 (0xFF) denotes non-equipable.

Read full topic
